de.esoco.storage.impl.jdbc

Class JdbcStorageDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • org.obrel.core.SerializableRelatedObject
        • de.esoco.storage.StorageDefinition
          • de.esoco.storage.impl.jdbc.JdbcStorageDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.manage.ElementDefinition<Storage>, java.io.Serializable, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public abstract class JdbcStorageDefinition
extends StorageDefinition
    A storage definition implementation for JDBC connections to SQL databases. It contains create(String) factory methods that create instances for different JDBC connection lookup methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getDatabaseParameters

        protected org.obrel.core.Relatable getDatabaseParameters(java.sql.Connection rConnection)
                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the database parameters for a certain JBDC connection.
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The database connection
        Returns:
        The database parameters or NULL to use default values
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if accessing the connection fails
